WEBVTT: Hello! We all know about existence of Google translator.
translatedContent: 你好！我们都知道谷歌翻译的存在。

WEBVTT: Millions of people using it every day.
translatedContent: 数百万人每天都在使用它。

WEBVTT: The quality of translation is improving.
But what if you have many documents to translate into many different languages? What if the content of
translatedContent: 但是如果你有很多文件要翻译成许多不同的语言呢？如果内容如何？

WEBVTT: these documents may change over time?
translatedContent: 这些文件可能随时间而改变？

WEBVTT: You probably don't have any other choice but to automate your translations!
translatedContent: 您可能没有其他选择，只能自动翻译！

WEBVTT: So what if I tell you that you can start translating with Minimum programming expertise and with minimum
translatedContent: 那么，如果我告诉你，你可以用最少的编程专业知识和最低限度的条件开始翻译

WEBVTT: Moreover you can start translating even for free.
translatedContent: 此外，您甚至可以免费开始翻译。

WEBVTT: So don't wait, join this course because you will be able to turn your computer into the text translating
translatedContent: 所以不要等待，加入这门课程是因为您可以将您的计算机转换为文本翻译

WEBVTT: You will be literally able to sleep while your computer doing your job.
translatedContent: 当你的计算机完成你的工作时，你将可以从字面上入睡。

WEBVTT: So looking forward to see you in the class.
translatedContent: 所以期待在课堂上见到你。
